pr_title: docs: synth updates to javadoc and kokoro build configs

timeline.message: [CHANGE ME] Re-generated  to pick up changes in the API or client library generator.

timeline.bodyText: This might break the build, I can't find any profile named enable-samples
timeline.author: igorbernstein2
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,23 +39,41 @@ fi
 
 case ${JOB_TYPE} in
 test)
-    mvn test -B -Dclirr.skip=true
+    mvn test -B -Dclirr.skip=true -Denforcer.skip=true
     bash ${KOKORO_GFILE_DIR}/codecov.sh
     bash .kokoro/coerce_logs.sh
     ;;
 lint)
-    mvn com.coveo:fmt-maven-plugin:check
+    mvn \
+      -Penable-samples \

replies.bodyText: These won't run until we set up a build config and move the samples into this repo, so should be ok. Presubmits are all still passing with this change
replies.author: kolea2

timeline.author: igorbernstein2
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,23 +39,41 @@ fi
 
 case ${JOB_TYPE} in
 test)
-    mvn test -B -Dclirr.skip=true
+    mvn test -B -Dclirr.skip=true -Denforcer.skip=true
     bash ${KOKORO_GFILE_DIR}/codecov.sh
     bash .kokoro/coerce_logs.sh
     ;;
 lint)
-    mvn com.coveo:fmt-maven-plugin:check
+    mvn \
+      -Penable-samples \
+      com.coveo:fmt-maven-plugin:check
     ;;
 javadoc)
     mvn javadoc:javadoc javadoc:test-javadoc
     ;;
 integration)
-    mvn -B ${INTEGRATION_TEST_ARGS} -DtrimStackTrace=false -Dclirr.skip=true -fae verify
+    mvn -B ${INTEGRATION_TEST_ARGS} \
+      -Penable-integration-tests \
+      -DtrimStackTrace=false \
+      -Dclirr.skip=true \
+      -Denforcer.skip=true \
+      -fae \
+      verify
+    bash .kokoro/coerce_logs.sh
+    ;;
+samples)
+    mvn -B \
+      -Penable-samples \

timeline.bodyText:
This is interesting, are samples expected to be hosted in this repo? Ours currently live in
https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples/blob/master/bigtable
timeline.author: igorbernstein2

replies.bodyText: This will basically remain dormant until we configure the samples build and move the samples into this repo.
replies.author: kolea2
